definition:
The M113A4 Armored Medical Evacuation Vehicle
(AMEV) is a U.S. Army variant of a M113 armoured personnel carrier (APC) made by
United Defense (now part of BAE Systems) modified to function as a battlefield
emergency medical evacuation (medevac) vehicle. It replaced the M113A3 Armoured
Ambulance in U.S. military service and is designed to operate in conjunction with
the M577A4 Armored Treatment Vehicle. [from Wikipedia]
